description:
Akane accepts Yukiko`s invite to her middle school cultural festival, unaware that a yukata date with Taiyou awaits! And as the school field day approaches, nothing can dampen Taiyou`s excitement, or so you would think...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Yukata to Jungle Gym to Gips
Yukata, Jungle Gyms, and Orthopedic Casts
浴衣とジャングルジムとギプス
